title: Simple Setup Process for Easy Use
summary: As an older adult, I want a straightforward installation and configuration process for ALFRED so that I can start using it without technical difficulties or frustration.

title: Protecting Privacy and Personal Information
summary: As an older adult, I want to ensure that my personal and health information is kept private and secure so that I can use ALFRED confidently without worrying about data breaches.

title: User-Friendly and Accessible Features
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to provide a simple and intuitive interface that I can navigate easily using voice commands, so that I can maintain my independence and stay connected without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: User-Friendly Interface for Easy Navigation
summary: As an older adult, I want a simple and intuitive interface that caters to my abilities so that I can easily manage my daily tasks, stay connected with family, and participate in social activities without frustration.

title: Device Compatibility for Enhanced Connectivity
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to seamlessly connect with my smartphones and tablets so that I can communicate easily with my family and stay updated on social activities without technical difficulties.

title: User Privacy and Consent for Data Sharing
summary: As an older adult, I want to have clear and simple options for managing my privacy and consent regarding my personal and health data, so that I feel secure and in control of my information while using ALFRED.

title: Easy Onboarding for New Users
summary: As an older adult, I want a simple and guided onboarding process so that I can easily set up and navigate the ALFRED system without feeling overwhelmed by technology.
